channel.title: Membership
channel.description: Well I got mebership 2 months ago and now I noticed it says on my mebership days left I have 1 day left but it says please renew before you lose status but I'm paying with a credit card and it's not out of money so will it automatically renew? Like usual? Thanks

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

I guess…my mebership ends tomorrow so if they can’t get the payment I’ll try that

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:7, topic:197719”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=262324.msg2172818#msg2172818 date=1207715902]
check your runescape inbox, usually if they’ve tried to take a payment, but haven’t been able to they will leave a message saying something like
“Hi we tried to take money from your card but it got rejected, we will try again tomorrow”

etc
[/quote]
I read my messages and thats what I got wtf…I mean I no it’s not out of $…[/quote]
You could try cancelling the subsription then setting up a new one to see if that fixes it.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

It most likely says that, then it’s automatically renewed when time runs out.
Just in case you want to cancel the subscription before a new payment is withdrawn.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:

check your runescape inbox, usually if they’ve tried to take a payment, but haven’t been able to they will leave a message saying something like
“Hi we tried to take money from your card but it got rejected, we will try again tomorrow”

etc
